org.apache.hadoop.hive.metastore.txn

Class TxnDbUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hive.metastore.txn.TxnDbUtil

  • public final class TxnDbUtil
extends Object
    Utility methods for creating and destroying txn database/schema, plus methods for querying against metastore tables. Placed here in a separate class so it can be shared across unit tests.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void cleanDb(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf) 
      static int countLockComponents(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf, long lockId)
      A tool to count the number of partitions, tables, and databases locked by a particular lockId.
      static int countQueryAgent(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf, String countQuery)
      Utility method used to run COUNT queries like "select count(*) from ..." against metastore tables
      static void prepDb(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf) 
      static String queryToString(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf, String query) 
      static String queryToString(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf, String query, boolean includeHeader) 
      static void setConfValues(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)
      Set up the configuration so it will use the DbTxnManager, concurrency will be set to true, and the JDBC configs will be set for putting the transaction and lock info in the embedded metastore.

      • countLockComponents

        public static int countLockComponents(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf,
                                      long lockId)
                               throws Exception
        A tool to count the number of partitions, tables, and databases locked by a particular lockId.
        Parameters:
        lockId - lock id to look for lock components
        Returns:
        number of components, or 0 if there is no lock
        Throws:
        Exception
